```{r setup, echo=FALSE}
library(pyramidi)
library(stringr)
library(purrr)
library(DiagrammeR)

mt_funs <- c("frame_midi", "unnest_midi", "nest_midi", "write_midi")

mt_fun_descrs <- map_chr(mt_funs, ~miditapyr[[.x]]$`__doc__`) %>% 
  str_split("\\n\\n") %>% 
  map_chr(1) %>% 
  str_replace_all("\\n", " ") %>% 
  str_squish() %>% 
  str_remove_all(":.*?:") %>% 
  str_remove_all("[`~]") 


grViz("package_workflow.gv")
```
